mapper.insert: INSERT INTO moim_tb ( moim_title, moim_discription, moim_max_member, moim_member_count, moim_image_path, district_id, category_id, user_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{discription}, #{maxMember}, 1, #{moimImgPath}, #{districtId}, #{categoryId}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT moim_id, moim_title, moim_discription, moim_member_count, moim_img_path FROM moim_tb WHERE moim_id = #{moimId}
select moim_id, moim_title, moim_discription, moim_member_count, moim_img_path from moim_tb
SELECT m.moim_id, m.moim_title, m.moim_discription, m.moim_member_count, m.moim_img_path FROM moim_tb m JOIN user_tb u ON m.category_id = u.category_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT moim_id, moim_title, moim_discription, moim_member_count, moim_img_path FROM moim_tb WHERE (#{categoryId} = 1 OR category_id = #{categoryId})
